column2: Fluent, Inc. engages in the provision of digital marketing services. The company is headquartered in New York City, New York and currently employs 170 full-time employees. The firm operates through two segments: Information Services and Performance Marketing. Information Services segment provides solutions to organizations within the risk management and consumer marketing industries. Performance Marketing Segment provides solutions to help brands, advertisers and marketers to find customers in business-to-consumer (B2C) vertical including internet and telecommunications, financial services, health and wellness, consumer packaged goods, careers and education, and retail and entertainment. The Companyâ€™s solutions include data acquisition solutions which includes connect and reconnect. Audience solutions which include performancenow and audience now. Mobile user acquisition solutions include mobilenow.
